snippet: SCHWARTZ--Lawrence. The Schragis Family mourns the profound loss of their beloved, brave, wise, witty friend, uncle, neighbor and travel companion. Always strong in the face of tragedy and adversity, we were blessed to have known him over 65 years. Our love and support always to his wife Selma, son Andrew, and grandchildren Ricky and Julia. 1/3
